department.dept_long_name: Committee on the Study of Religion

course.title: Religion, Gender, Identity: Readings in Arab and Muslim Autobiography: Seminar
course.description: We will read autobiographical works mainly by 20th century 'Arab' writers, Muslim, Christian and Jewish, paying particular attention to issues of religion, gender and identity, exploring how these are at play in the texts and in authorial constructions of self, history, and meaning.
course.notes: Offered jointly with the Divinity School as 3616.
